import React from'react';import{Card,CardHeader,CardContent,CardMedia,Typography,Button,Avatar,Box}from'@mui/material';import{styled}from'@mui/material/styles';import{LocalOffer,Campaign}from'@mui/icons-material';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdCard=styled(Card)({backgroundColor:'rgba(20, 20, 50, 0.9)',borderRadius:'12px',border:'1px solid #00f2ff',marginBottom:'20px',position:'relative','&:hover':{boxShadow:'0 0 20px rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.4)'}});const SponsoredTag=styled(Box)({position:'absolute',top:10,right:10,backgroundColor:'rgba(0, 242, 255, 0.9)',color:'#0a0a1f',padding:'4px 8px',borderRadius:'4px',fontSize:'12px',fontWeight:'bold',display:'flex',alignItems:'center',gap:'4px'});const Advertisement=_ref=>{let{type,data}=_ref;const handleClick=()=>{// Track ad click
